CustomField.formula: CASE(text(Type__c ), "Disbursement",Amount__c, "Repayment",-Amount__c, "Fee",-Amount__c, "Disbursement Correction",-Amount__c, "Repayment Correction",Amount__c, "Fee Correction",-Amount__c, "Schedule (Paid)",-Amount__c, "Schedule (Partially Paid)",-Amount__c, "Schedule (Late)",-Amount__c, "Schedule (Not Due)",-Amount__c, "Schedule (Partially Paid (Late))",-Amount__c, 0)
CustomField.label: Investment Cashflow Amount
